name: theCompassCraftBeverageFinder
0:
”Alexa ask the compass craft beverage finder how many craft beverage producers are in Oregon”
”Alexa ask the compass craft beverage finder how many wineries are in Virginia”
”Alexa ask the compass craft beverage finder how many breweries are in Colorado”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the compass craft beverage finder
Developer Terms of Use
des:
theCompass Craft Beverage Finder Mobile Application displays wineries, breweries, cider houses, and distilleries for North America. Establishments can be mapped using a radius search of the device’s location or by the establishment name, city, or zipcode. Users can also browse establishments by state for the United States or by province for Canada. All results can be filtered by industry type (winery, brewery, distillery, or cidery).

Alexa users can ask for the number of craft beverage establishments by state and industry by stating the specific state-province and the specific industry. If the user would like the overall number of craft beverage producers in that state-province than use the phrase "craft beverage producers".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
